mode.name: mode
mode.help: Run the Application / Update to latest version / Runthe Command Builder Application / Read EULA (default:run)

upCombos.name: upCombos
upCombos.help: Username and Password Set Combinations (Optimized)(default: ALL)

telnetPort.name: telnetPort
telnetPort.help: Default Telnet port is 23. Run for an alternativeport. (default: 23)

networkAddress.name: networkAddress
networkAddress.help: Enter Network IP Addressing, ex.: 192.168.1.0/24(default: None)

inputFileDirectoryLocation.name: inputFileDirectoryLocation
inputFileDirectoryLocation.help: Enter Full Path of Files to Import (text / nmapXML /masscanXML). NOTE: May import multiple files at once.***Put paths in quotes! (default: None)

processMultiThread.name: processMultiThread
processMultiThread.help: Control Threading per IP hosts. (NOTE: Singlethreading should be used for debugging) (default:True)

threadCount.name: threadCount
threadCount.help: Set the number of threads to run from 1 to 50.(default: 15)

showLoginOutput.name: showLoginOutput
showLoginOutput.help: Shows the text found after authentication (ifavailable) (default: Yes)

reportFullPath.name: reportFullPath
reportFullPath.help: Full path where to save report "/home/output.txt" or"C:\users\output.txt" (default: None)

reportFilenameText.name: reportFilenameText
reportFilenameText.help: Report output filename for text format (default: )

reportFilenameCSV.name: reportFilenameCSV
reportFilenameCSV.help: Report output filename for CSV Format (adv) (default:)

reportFilenameXML.name: reportFilenameXML
reportFilenameXML.help: Report output filename for XML Format (adv) (default:)

Manufacturer.name: Manufacturer
Manufacturer.help: Select Specific Manufacturer (-upCombos must beManufacturer) (adv) (default: None)

Model.name: Model
Model.help: Select Specific Device Model (-upCombos must beManufacturer) (adv) (default: None)

app.name: app
app.help: Basic runs bruteforce only. Advanced mode will mapcredentials to device/app. (adv) (default: Advanced)

BruteForceAfterMapTesting.name: BruteForceAfterMapTesting
BruteForceAfterMapTesting.help: Bruteforce hosts and ports after mapped credentialcheck! (adv) (default: No)

connectionTimeout.name: connectionTimeout
connectionTimeout.help: Set the amount of time before connection times outfrom 5 to 25 (adv) (default: 5)

testAllCombos.name: testAllCombos
testAllCombos.help: Tests for all default password combos after findingfirst vuln (telnet only) (adv) (default: No)

testUnauthorized.name: testUnauthorized
testUnauthorized.help: Tests devices with "Unauthorized" banner (telnet only)(adv) (default: Yes)

supressExtraBanner.name: supressExtraBanner
supressExtraBanner.help: Do not show the OpCode 41 Security, Inc. Extra BannerMessages (default: No)

proxyServer.name: proxyServer
proxyServer.help: HTTP Proxy Server IP Address (Updates Only!) (default:None)

proxyPort.name: proxyPort
proxyPort.help: HTTP Proxy Server Port (Updates Only!) (default: None)

proxyUsername.name: proxyUsername
proxyUsername.help: HTTP Proxy Server User Name (Updates Only!) (default:None)

licenseKey.name: licenseKey
licenseKey.help: IoT Crusher Software License Key (default: None)
